name: NoClue
description: '''Ricky Raphel Brown''' (born January 28, 1985), known professionally as '''NoClue''', is an American rapper from [[Seattle]].  He is best known for obtaining the title of the world's official “Fastest Rap MC” by [[Guinness World Records]], for rapping 723 syllables in 51.27 seconds (14.1 syllables per second) in January 2005.
